solution_line_template: {distance_north} miles north and {distance_west} miles west give {distance_north}+{distance_west}=<<{distance_north}+{distance_west}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} miles total
{total_distance} miles at {speed} miles an hour gives {total_distance}/{speed}=<<{total_distance}/{speed}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours
